subject: Re: Wolf IQ | Annual Pro Plan for Westcoat website

full_threads.body:
Hi Mikaela,

Sure, we are looking into this, unfortunately we are unable to replicate the issue from our end and It might be caching issue. We have adjusted the caching settings and also cleared the site and server cache.
If it happens again can you send us a screenshot.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Andy,

The form seems to work when logged into WordPress however when not the same
issue is still occurring. We are receiving the entries but the customer
filling out the form cant tell if it has been submitted or not as it just
appears to be loading. I just conducted a test from my computer and mobile
phone and both have the same issue.

Thanks,

*Mikaela Jenkins - Operations Manager *

Andy

Hi Aaron,

Thanks for the call.

Here is a link below for you to submit the login details.
https://share.hsforms.com/1HPRBDI6KQ5a2dDLWr2Q4dgr1ez5

Username, and Password. The form takes less than a minute to complete:

Alternatively if you'd like to add us as a new user, just add
*support@wolfiq.com.au
<support@wolfiq.com.au>*

Thanks and speak Tuesday.
Andy

Ps. Here is one of the reports I mentioned
<https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-westcoat-com-au/0wl944juxm?form_factor=mobile>.
Fixing these will help get us back higher in the search results.
